text: @JoeBiden @realDonaldTrump  and the @GOP will never be forgiven for compromising our country’s stability & security including their mismanagement of #GlobalDiplomacy #COVID19, #HealthInsurance, #RaceRelations, the #environment, #education, our #economy and more. #VoteJoeBidenForPresident
